casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Sydney Shakur MERCER 257P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2018 Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Daniel K. Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, Sydney Shakur Mercer, for Mercer, Sydney Shakur.

Daniel O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of August 2018 by State of NC to File Petition for Writ of Supersedeas and Application for Temporary Stay with Corrected Certificate of Service:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2018."
